_exec_summary.SummaryText:
CARPER FARM SUPPLY INC,

BOX 159 

309 NORTH GRAND AV.

ASHLEY IN. 46705

 

 

RE. EXECUTIVE SUMMARY

 

HAZARDOUS MATERIALS SECURITY: GIVEN THE HEIGHTENED SPECTER OF TERRORISM THE SECURITY OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS HAS BECOME A PRIORITY FOR CARRIERS, STORAGE FACILITIES,  CONSIGNEE , SHIPPERS , EMERGENCY RESPONDERS AND GOVERNMENT OFFICIALS. THUS, IT BECOMES NECESSARY FOR CARPER FARM SUPPLY INC. TO EXAMINE OUR PROCEDURES WITH A SECURITY FOCUS. ADDRESSING SECURITY CONCERNS HAS BECOME A PART OF OUR OVERALL STRATEGY TO MANAGE THE RISKS OF HAZARDOUS MATERIALS IN OUR PIPELINE. WE WILL DO THIS PRIORITY IN A PROACTIVE MANNER AND WITH THE INVOLVEMENT AND HELP OR ALL EMPLOYEES. NO TWO COMPANIES ARE ALIKE IN OPERATIONS AND RISK AND OUR FOCUS IS TO ASSESS WHAT COURSE OF DIRECTION WE WANT UNDERTAKE. OUR POLICY NEEDS TO BE IMPLEMENTED AND UNDERSTOOD BUT FLEXIBLE ENOUGH TO PROVIDE THE FRAMEWORK NEEDED TO CONTINUALLY EVALUATE AND UPGRADE OUR ABILITY TO MITIGATE SECURITY RISKS.

 

PRINCIPLES APPLIED TO MANAGING SECURITY RISK:  THIS OUTLINE IS OUR FUNDAMENTAL PRINCIPLES THAT ARE CRITICAL FOR SUCCESSFULLY MANAGING RISK. EVERY EMPLOYEE MUST MAKE A COMMITMENT TO REDUCING SECURITY RISK AND PROMOTE A RISK REDUCTION CULTURE WITH A SECURITY FOCUS IN OUR DAY TO DAY OPERATIONS.  EVERY EMPLOYEE MUST PARTNER WITH ALL PARTIES INVOLVED [FIRE, POLICE AGENCIES, CUSTOMER]  IN SECURING OUR HAZARDOUS MATERIAL DISTRIBUTION CHAIN. AS A FERTILIZER RETAIL PLANT WE WILL USE A RISK MANAGEMENT APPROACH TO ENSURE THAT OUT HIGHER RISK MATERIALS RECEIVE APPROPRIATE ATTENTION BOTH IN TRANSPORTATION RISK MANAGEMENT AND IN HANDLING. IN ADDITION WE HAVE EMPLOYEES WHO OVERSEE THE ACTIVITIES OF OUR FACILITIES, HANDLING, STORING, OR SHIPPING CERTAIN HAZARDOUS PRODUCTS. THESE EMPLOYEES REVIEW CONSTRUCTION, DESIGN, MAINTENANCE, OPERATIONAL, AND PROCEDURAL STANDARDS AS WELL AS SPECIAL REQUIREMENTS. SUCH AS PERIODIC ROUTING EVALUATIONS. 

 

WE ARE A FERTILIZER RETAIL PLANT THAT BLENDS RAW FERTILIZER FOR FARMER TO APPLY TO

THERE FIELDS. WE ALSO SPRAY HERBICIDES TO FIELDS TO CONTROL WEEDS AND INSECTS. WE DO SOIL TEST TO INSURE THAT THE CORRECT AMOUNT OF FERTILIZER IS APPLIED TO THE FIELDS.

 

WE HAVE NOT HAD ANY ACCIDENTAL RELEASES OF OUR PRODUCTS PART DO TO ON GOING TRAINING WITH ALL PERSONNEL IN COORDINATION WITH THE FIRE DEPT AND POLICE DEPT WITH EACH DEPARTMENT  TRAIN HOW TO DO PUBLIC NOTIFICATION AND ALERT SYSTEMS AS APPROPRIATE.
